name: Odyssey Of The Cog
description:
In a world where all that matters is becoming Employee of the Month, how can you survive?

*Contains crude humor in written form*

Made in around 3 days for the Wowie Jam 3.

The theme was Failure is success.

WASD - Move
Click - Interact
Q - Eat cheese to heal
E - Drink energy drink to recover energy
Space - Jump
P - Pause Menu

Music credits:

Cubicle theme by Pirate Chip Games

Market theme by Bit Orchestra:
